history.narrative: Law 17-179, the “Closing Agreement Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-69 which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 1, 2008, and May 6, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 20, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-372 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-179 became effective on July 18, 2008.
